title: Justen's CV

basic.intro: Iâ€™m Justen, a Javascript and Elixir developer based in London (happy to work remotely). I love all things code, education, design, travelling and languages. I am a mentor at the Founders & Coders collective and a member of the DWYL freelancer community.

Coding for Everyone Meetup: Set up a weekly meetup focussed on helping people learn how to code

references.name: Dan Sofer
references.comment: Justen, is a first-class developer with a first-class attitude. I can recommend him without reservation.

references.name: Nelson Correia
references.comment: Words that comes to mind when I think of Justen: Genuine, natural, talented, can-do, focussed, fast-learner, teacher, humble, patience, quiet, humorous, reliable, punctual, well-spoken, empathetic, caring, team-player, leader. </br> He does not fit any text-book 'personality type'. He is well-rounded, grounded and determined and turns his hand to anything in his pursuit of understanding and overcoming a challenge. He is joy to work with and an asset to any team; I would be delighted to work/learn with him again!
